summary_markdown:
# About tambo

Tambo is a technology company that focuses on simplifying the development of AI-powered applications. The company is gearing up for the release of Tambo v1.0.0, which is expected to bring significant enhancements to its platform. Tambo's primary product is its platform, which enables developers to create applications with natural language interfaces. The platform is particularly geared towards developers and companies looking to integrate AI into their applications, especially those using React.

Tambo offers several key services to facilitate AI application development:

- **Streaming Support**: This feature enhances user experience by enabling the streaming of AI-generated UI components.
- **Message Thread History**: Automatically stores message history, allowing developers to focus on functionality rather than data management.
- **State Management**: Provides an AI-integrated state hook to track user inputs and pass them to the AI, streamlining the development process.
- **Suggested Actions**: Transforms AI assistants into guides for app functionality, helping users navigate applications more effectively.
- **Decision Loop**: Manages AI orchestration, allowing developers to concentrate on adding features rather than managing AI processes.

The upcoming version 1.0.0 of the Tambo platform includes several enhancements:

- An improved React interface with better message threading and streaming capabilities.
- A new dashboard that provides insights into user interactions and project-level configuration tools.
- Real-time status updates to keep users informed about AI activities.
- Stateful components that use interactions as input for future AI responses.

Tambo's products are distributed primarily to developers and companies, indicating a B2B business model. The company encourages innovation and user feedback, inviting developers to reach out with suggestions and inquiries.

Tambo is set to officially launch version 1.0.0 at the Seattle Startup Summit 2025 on March 28th, where they will showcase the new features and improvements.

For more information, visit [Tambo's website](https://tambo.co/) and check out their [blog](https://tambo.co/blog) for updates.

# Key personnel

Details about the leadership team at Tambo are not provided in the available content. This lack of information makes it challenging to assess the background and experience of the company's key personnel.

# News

There are no specific news articles provided in the available content. However, the upcoming launch of Tambo v1.0.0 at the Seattle Startup Summit 2025 is a significant event for the company, as it will showcase the new features and improvements of their platform.

# Tambo Company Overview

## Company History
Tambo is a technology company focused on simplifying the development of AI-powered applications. The company is preparing for the release of Tambo v1.0.0, which promises significant enhancements to its platform.

## Services
Tambo provides tools and features that enable developers to build AI applications with ease. Key services include:

- **Streaming Support**: Facilitates the streaming of AI-generated UI components, enhancing user experience.
  
- **Message Thread History**: Automatically stores message history, allowing developers to focus on functionality.
  
- **State Management**: Offers an AI-integrated state hook to track user inputs and pass them to the AI.
  
- **Suggested Actions**: Transforms AI assistants into guides for app functionality.
  
- **Decision Loop**: Manages AI orchestration, allowing developers to concentrate on adding features.

## Products
The main product is the Tambo platform, which allows developers to create applications with natural language interfaces. The upcoming version 1.0.0 includes:

- Enhanced React interface with improved message threading and streaming capabilities.
- A new dashboard for insights into user interactions and project-level configuration tools.
- Real-time status updates to keep users informed about AI activities.
- Stateful components that treat interactions as input for future AI responses.

## Customers
Tambo targets developers and companies looking to integrate AI into their applications, particularly those using React.

## Leadership Team
Details about the leadership team are not provided in the available content.

## Culture
Tambo emphasizes innovation and user feedback, encouraging developers to reach out with suggestions and inquiries.

## Upcoming Events
Tambo will officially launch version 1.0.0 at the Seattle Startup Summit 2025 on March 28th, where they will showcase the new features and improvements.

For more information, visit [Tambo's website](https://tambo.co/) and check out their [blog](https://tambo.co/blog) for updates.
page_markdowns:
# [Build AI-powered apps in just one line of code.](https://tambo.co/)
Streaming

We support streaming of every AI generated bit of your UI, including react components, with helpful hooks to improve the UX.

Message Thread History

We automagically store message history. You can focus on functionality, while we take care of the rest.

State Management

We give you an AI integrated state hook that keeps track of user inputs, and passes them to the AI.

Suggested Actions

Turn your AI assistant into a guide through the functionality of your app.

Decision Loop

We handle AI orchestration so you can focus on adding the functionality.

# [tambo on 2025-02-10](https://tambo.co/blog)
February 10, 2025 (1mo ago)

Tambo 1.0.0 is Coming!

Read article

# [Build AI-powered apps in just one line of code.](https://tambo.co/dashboard)
Welcome to Tambo

Get started by signing in with your preferred method

# [Welcome!](https://tambo.co/docs)
On this documentation site you'll learn how to use Tambo to build AI applications with natural language interfaces.

# [Tambo 1.0.0 is Coming! on 2025-02-10](https://tambo.co/blog/0-1-0-announcement)
We're thrilled to announce the upcoming release of Tambo v1.0.0! This release brings significant improvements to our React interface and introduces powerful new features that make AI integration smoother and more powerful than ever.

What's New in 1.0.0

Enhanced React Interface

We've completely revamped the developer experience with several key improvements:

Message Threading: New hooks and persistence capabilities for better conversation management

Streamlined Streaming: Easy-to-setup streaming with powerful hooks for fine-grained control

Improved Decision Loop: Upgraded system for identifying the right function calls (tools) and components to show end users

Real-time Status Updates: Keep users informed about what the AI is doing in real-time

Stateful Components: Component interactions are now treated as input for future generations, creating more contextual and relevant responses

and more!

New Dashboard

We're introducing a comprehensive dashboard that provides:

Insights into user interactions

Detailed analytics

Project-level configuration tools

This new dashboard will help you better understand how users interact with your AI features and make it easier to configure and optimize your adaptive UI experiences.

Launch Event

We're excited to officially release version 1.0.0 at the Seattle Startup Summit 2025 on March 28th. Join us to see these features in action and learn how they can enhance your applications.

Learn More

Want to get a head start with the new features? Check out our documentation for the 0.1.0 release for detailed information about all the upcoming changes and improvements. Please note that this doc is a living document and will be updated as we approach the release date. If you have any feedback don't hesitate to reach out to us at magan@tambo.co.

Stay tuned for more updates as we approach the release date!
